anya-e0809n4:4: Sā’ṅgo’pāṅgehi kathyante, kaṇḍe vaggā iha kkamā.
anya-e0809n4:9: Sobhanaṃ ruciraṃ sādhu, manuññaṃ cāru sundaraṃ;
anya-e0809n4:10: Vaggu manoramaṃ kantaṃ, hārī mañju ca pesalaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:12: Bhaddaṃ vāmañca kalyāṇaṃ, manāpaṃ laddhakaṃ subhaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:15: Mukhyo padhānaṃ pāmokkho, para maggañña muttaraṃ;
anya-e0809n4:16: Paṇītaṃ paramaṃ seyyo, gāmaṇī seṭṭha sattamā.
anya-e0809n4:19: Sīha kuñjara saddūlā, dī tu samāsagā pume.
anya-e0809n4:22: Iṭṭhaṃ tu subhagaṃ hajjaṃ, dayitaṃ vallabhaṃ piyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:24: Tucchañca rittakaṃ suññaṃ, athā’sārañca pheggu ca;
anya-e0809n4:25: Mejjhaṃ pūtaṃ pavitto tha, aviraddho apaṇṇako.
anya-e0809n4:27: Ukkaṭṭho ca pakaṭṭho tha, nihīno hīna lāmakā;
anya-e0809n4:32: Brahā mahantaṃ vipulaṃ, visālaṃ puthulaṃ puthu.
anya-e0809n4:34: Garu’ru vitthiṇṇa matho, pīnaṃ thūlañca pīvaraṃ;
anya-e0809n4:35: Thullañca vaṭharañcā tha, ācitaṃ nicitaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n4:37: Sabbaṃ samatta makhilaṃ, nikhilaṃ sakalaṃ tathā;
anya-e0809n4:40: Bhūri pahutaṃ pacuraṃ, bhiyyo sambahulaṃ bahu;
anya-e0809n4:43: Parosatādī te, yesaṃ, paraṃ mattaṃ satādito;
anya-e0809n4:44: Parittaṃ sukhumaṃ khuddaṃ, thoka mappaṃ kisaṃ tanu.
anya-e0809n4:51: Sakāsaṃ antikaṃ ñattaṃ, dūraṃ tu vippakaṭṭhakaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:53: Nirantaraṃ ghanaṃ sandaṃ, viraḷaṃ pelavaṃ tanu;
anya-e0809n4:54: Athā yataṃ dīgha matho, nittalaṃ vaṭṭa vaṭṭulaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:56: Ucco tu unnato tuṅgo, udaggo ceva ucchito;
anya-e0809n4:57: Nīco rasso vāmano tha, ajimho paguṇo uju.
anya-e0809n4:59: Aḷāraṃ vellitaṃ vaṅkaṃ, kuṭilaṃ jimha kuñcitaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:60: Dhuvo ca sassato nicco, sadātana sanantanā.
anya-e0809n4:63: Lahu sallahukaṃ cātha, saṅkhyātaṃ gaṇitaṃ mitaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:65: Tiṇhaṃ tu tikhiṇaṃ tibbaṃ, caṇḍaṃ uggaṃ kharaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n4:69: Thāvaro jaṅgamā añño, lolaṃ tu cañcalaṃ calaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:74: Kurūraṃ kaṭhinaṃ daḷhaṃ, niṭṭhuraṃ kakkhaḷaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n4:77: Jighaññaṃ carimaṃ pubbaṃ, tva’ggaṃ paṭhama mādi so;
anya-e0809n4:80: Byattaṃ puṭa phuṭaṃ (sī.) ñca mudu tu, sukumārañca komalaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:83: Itarā’ññataro eko, añño bahuvidho tu ca;
anya-e0809n4:84: Nānārūpo ca vividho, abādhaṃ tu niraggalaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:86: Athe’kākī ca ekacco, eko ca ekako samā;
anya-e0809n4:87: Sādhāraṇañca sāmaññaṃ, sambādho tu ca saṃkaṭaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:89: Vāmaṃ kaḷevaraṃ sabyaṃ; Apasabyaṃ tu dakkhiṇaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:95: Nipuṇo ca paṭu cheko, cāturo dakkha pesalā;
anya-e0809n4:96: Bālo dattu jalo mūḷho, mando viññū ca bāliso.
anya-e0809n4:99: Mahātaṇho mahiccho tha, hadayī hadayālu ca.
anya-e0809n4:101: Sumano haṭṭhacitto tha, dummano vimano pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:106: Vissuto vidito ceva, pasiddho pākaṭo bhave.
anya-e0809n4:112: Dānāraho dakkhiṇeyyo, siniddho tu ca vacchalo;
anya-e0809n4:116: Kāruṇiko dayālupi, sūrato ussuko tu ca;
anya-e0809n4:119: Parādhīno parāyatto, āyatto tu ca santako;
anya-e0809n4:120: Pariggaho adhīno ca, sacchando tu ca serini.
anya-e0809n4:126: Kāmayitā tu kamitā, kāmano kāmi kāmuko;
anya-e0809n4:136: Sahano khamano khantā, titikkhavā ca khantimā.
anya-e0809n4:138: Saddhāyutto tu saddhālu, dhajavā tu dhajālu ca lajjālutu ca lajjavā (ka.);
anya-e0809n4:139: Niddālu niddāsīlo tha, bhassaro bhāsuro bhave.
anya-e0809n4:141: Naggo digambaro’vattho, ghasmaro tu ca bhakkhako;
anya-e0809n4:142: Eḷamūgo tu vattuñca, sotuṃ cā’kusalo bhave.
anya-e0809n4:145: Vācālo bahugārayha, vace vattā tu so vado.
anya-e0809n4:152: Sīsacchejjamhi vajjho tha, nikato ca saṭho’nuju;
anya-e0809n4:156: Anisamma hi yo kiccaṃ, puriso vadhabandhanādi mācarati;
anya-e0809n4:159: Khuddo kadariyo thaddha, maccharī kapaṇo pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:160: Akiñcano daliddo ca, dīno niddhana duggatā.
anya-e0809n4:163: Atha yācanako atthī, yācako ca vanibbako.
anya-e0809n4:171: Rādhito sādhito cātha, nippakkaṃ kuthitaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n4:174: Nuṇṇo nuttā’tta, khittā ce’, ritā viddhā tha kampito;
anya-e0809n4:175: Dhūto ādhūta calitā, nisitaṃ tu ca tejitaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:177: Pattabbaṃ gamma māpajjaṃ āsajjaṃ (ka.), pakkaṃ pariṇataṃ samā;
anya-e0809n4:178: Veṭhitaṃ tu valayitaṃ, ruddhaṃ saṃvuta māvutaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:184: Lajjito hīḷito cātha, sanitaṃ dhanitaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:188: Siddhe nipphanna nibbattā, dārite bhinna bheditā;
anya-e0809n4:189: Channo tu chādite cātha, viddhe chiddita vedhitā.
anya-e0809n4:201: Bhaṭṭhaṃ tu galitaṃ pannaṃ, cutañca dhaṃsitaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n4:209: Anvesitaṃ gavesitaṃ, laddhaṃ tu patta muccate.
anya-e0809n4:212: Pālitaṃ atha ossaṭṭhaṃ, cattaṃ hīnaṃ samujjhitaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:227: Ñeyyaṃ liṅga miha kvāpi, paccayatthavasena ca;
anya-e0809n4:230: Damo ca damatho danti, vattaṃ tu suddhakammani;
anya-e0809n4:233: Bhedo vidāro phuṭanaṃ, tappanaṃ tu ca pīṇanaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:237: Ninnimittaṃ yadicchā thā’, pucchanā nandanāni ca;
anya-e0809n4:247: Pacā pāko havo huti hūbhi (sī. amarakosa),
anya-e0809n4:250: Jīraṇaṃ jāni tāṇaṃ tu, rakkhaṇaṃ pamitippamā;
anya-e0809n4:254: Nigādo nigado mādo, mado pasiti bandhanaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:268: Majjhanhiko majjhantiko (ṭī. sī. pī.) tu majjhanho, vemattaṃ tu ca nānatā.
anya-e0809n4:270: Vā jāgaro jāgariyaṃ jāgariyo (ṭī.), pavāho tu pavatti ca;
anya-e0809n4:282: Osānaṃ pariyosānaṃ, ukkaṃso’tisayo bhave avasānaṃ samāpanaṃ (?);
anya-e0809n4:286: Kiccaṃ tu karaṇīyañca, saṅkhāro vāsanā bhave.
anya-e0809n4:291: Pāṭho nipāṭho nipaṭho, vicayo magganā pume;
anya-e0809n4:305: Samayo samavāye ca, samūhe kāraṇe khaṇe;
anya-e0809n4:306: Paṭivedhe siyā kāle, pahāne lābha diṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n4:309: Pamāṇe ca pasaṃsāyaṃ, akkhare ca yase guṇe.
anya-e0809n4:315: Cakkaṃ sampattiyaṃ cakka, ratane maṇḍale bale.
anya-e0809n4:328: Attho payojane saddā, bhidheyye vuddhiyaṃ dhane;
anya-e0809n4:334: Guṇo paṭala rāsīsu, ānisaṃse ca bandhane;
anya-e0809n4:335: Appadhāne ca sīlādo, sukkādimhi jiyāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:338: Bhūto satta mahābhūtā, manussesu na nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:340: Vāccaliṅgo atītasmiṃ, jāte patte same mato;
anya-e0809n4:345: Anto nitthī samīpe cā, vasāne padapūraṇe;
anya-e0809n4:348: Nikāye sandhi sāmañña, ppasūtīsu kule bhave;
anya-e0809n4:352: Vāsaṭṭhāne ca gamane, visaṭatte visaratta visadattegatīritā.
anya-e0809n4:354: Phale vipassanā dibba, cakkhu sabbaññutāsu ca;
anya-e0809n4:360: Kesohāraṇa, jīvita, vuttisu vapane ca vāpasamakaraṇe;
anya-e0809n4:361: Kathane pamuttabhāva, jjhenādo jjhesanādo (sī.)vutta mapi tīsu.
anya-e0809n4:366: Sotaviññeyya satthesu, sutaṃ putte suto siyā;
anya-e0809n4:368: Kappo kāle yuge lese, paññatti paramāyusu;
anya-e0809n4:379: Byavadhāne vinaṭṭhe ca, bhede chidde manasya’pi.
anya-e0809n4:381: Ārogye kusalaṃ iṭṭha, vipāke kusalo tathā;
anya-e0809n4:390: Sevito yena yo niccaṃ, tatthāpi visayo siyā;
anya-e0809n4:391: Rūpādike janapade, tathā dese ca gocare.
anya-e0809n4:393: Bhāvo padatthe sattāya, madhippāya kriyāsu ca;
anya-e0809n4:396: So bandhave’ttani ca saṃ, so dhanasmi manitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:397: Sā pume sunakhe vutto, ttaniye so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n4:399: Suvaṇṇaṃ kanake vuttaṃ, suvaṇṇo garuḷe tathā;
anya-e0809n4:402: Varo devādikā devādito (sī.) iṭṭhe, jāmātari patimhi ca,
anya-e0809n4:403: Uttame vāccaliṅgo so, varaṃ mandappiye byayaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:408: Pitāmahe jine seṭṭhe, brāhmaṇe ca pitūsvapi;
anya-e0809n4:409: Brahmā vutto tathā brahmaṃ, vede tapasi vuccate.
anya-e0809n4:412: Mekhalāyaṃ matā kacchā, kaccho vutto latāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:416: Pamāṇaṃ hetu satthesu, māne ca saccavādini;
anya-e0809n4:419: Sattaṃ dabba’ttabhāvesu, pāṇesu ca bale, siyā bale sakkā (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n4:428: Padaṃ ṭhāne parittāṇe, nibbānamhi ca kāraṇe;
anya-e0809n4:429: Sadde vatthumhi koṭṭhāse, pāde tallañchane mataṃ.
anya-e0809n4:434: Khuddā ca makkhikābhede, madhumhi khudda, mappake;
anya-e0809n4:435: Adhame kapaṇe cāpi, bahumhi catūsu ttisu.
anya-e0809n4:437: Takke maraṇaliṅge ca, ariṭṭhaṃ asubhe subhe,;
anya-e0809n4:438: Ariṭṭho āsave kāke, nimbe ca pheniladdume.
anya-e0809n4:443: Mittakāre lañjadāne, bale rāsi vipattisu balarāsi vipattisu (ka.);
anya-e0809n4:446: Khandhe bhave nimittamhi, rūpaṃ vaṇṇe ca paccaye;
anya-e0809n4:447: Sabhāva sadda saṇṭhāna, rūpajjhāna vapūsu ca.
anya-e0809n4:449: Vatthu kilesa kāmesu, icchāyaṃ madane rate;
anya-e0809n4:450: Kāmo, kāmaṃ nikāme, cā, nuññāyaṃ kāma mabyayaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:458: Vuddhiyaṃ janane kāma, dhātvādīmhi ca pattiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:470: Ārammaṇe ca saṃsaṭṭhe, vokiṇṇe nissaye tathā;
anya-e0809n4:473: Tīsu channaṃ patirūpe, chādite ca nigūhite;
anya-e0809n4:485: Viññāṇe cittakamme ca, vicitte citta muccate;
anya-e0809n4:488: Sāmaṃ vedantare sāntve, taṃ pīte sāmale tisu;
anya-e0809n4:489: Sayamatthe byayaṃ sāmaṃ, sāmā ca sārivāyapi.
anya-e0809n4:492: Garu tīsu mahante ca, dujjarā’lahukesu ca.
anya-e0809n4:494: Accite vijjamāne ca, pasatthe sacca sādhusu;
anya-e0809n4:498: Devo visuddhidevā’do, megha maccu nabhesu ca;
anya-e0809n4:499: Athopi taruṇe satte, corepi māṇavo bhave.
anya-e0809n4:504: Yoni kāma siri’ssare, dhammu’yyāma yase bhagaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:505: Uḷāro tīsu vipule, seṭṭhe ca madhure siyā.
anya-e0809n4:507: Sampanno tīsu sampuṇṇe, madhure ca samaṅgini;
anya-e0809n4:508: Saṅkhā tu ñāṇe koṭṭhāsa, paññatti gaṇanesu ca.
anya-e0809n4:511: Atho māne pakāreca, koṭṭhāseca vidho dvisu.
anya-e0809n4:514: Ñāṇe ca somanasseca, vedo chandasi co’ccate.
anya-e0809n4:516: Khandhakoṭṭhāsa, passāva, magga, hetūsu yoni sā yoni so (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n4:517: Kāle tu kūle sīmāyaṃ, velā rāsimhi bhāsitā.
anya-e0809n4:519: Vohāro sadda paṇṇatti, vaṇijjā cetanāsu ca;
anya-e0809n4:524: Rāge tu mānaso cittā, rahattesu ca mānasaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:526: Mūlaṃ bhe santike mūla, mūle hetumhi pābhate;
anya-e0809n4:527: Rūpādyaṃ’sa pakaṇḍesu, khandho rāsi guṇesu ca.
anya-e0809n4:530: Atho hadayavatthumhi, citte ca hadayaṃ ure.
anya-e0809n4:536: Ālambaro tu sārambhe, bheribhede ca dissati.
anya-e0809n4:542: Vissāse yācanāyañca, peme ca paṇayo mato.
anya-e0809n4:547: Samatthane mato citte, kaggatāyaṃ samādhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:552: Bhūmibhāge kilese ca, male cā’ṅgaṇa muccate.
anya-e0809n4:554: Dhanādidappe paññāya, abhimāno mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:555: Apadeso nimitte ca, chale ca kathane mato.
anya-e0809n4:557: Citte kāye sabhāve ca, so attā parama’ttani;
anya-e0809n4:558: Atha gumbo ca thambasmiṃ thambhasmiṃ (ṭī.), samūhe balasajjane.
anya-e0809n4:560: Antoghare kusūle ca, koṭṭho ntokucchiyaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:564: Atho sikhaṇḍe tūṇīre, kalāpo nikare mato.
anya-e0809n4:566: Cūḷā saṃyatakesesu, makuṭe moḷi ca dvisu;
anya-e0809n4:567: Saṅkho tva’nitthiyaṃ kambu, nalāṭa’ṭṭhīsu lalāṭaṭṭhīsu (sī.) gopphake.
anya-e0809n4:569: Pakkho kāle bale sādhye, sakhī vājesu paṅgule;
anya-e0809n4:570: Dese’ṇṇave pume sindhu, saritāyaṃ sa nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:572: Gaje kareṇu purise, so hatthiniya mitthiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:575: Visāṇaṃ tīsu mātaṅga, dante ca pasusiṅgake;
anya-e0809n4:576: Koṭiyaṃ tu mato koṇo, tathā vādittavādane.
anya-e0809n4:578: Vaṇippathe ca nagare, vede ca nigamo tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:582: Harite tu suvaṇṇe ca, vāsudeve harī’rito.
anya-e0809n4:585: Uttaṃso tva’ vataṃso ca, kaṇṇapūre ca sekhare.
anya-e0809n4:590: Cūḷā jālā padhāna’gga, moracūḷāsu sā sikhā;
anya-e0809n4:597: Aṃse sippe kalā kāle, bhāge candassa soḷase.
anya-e0809n4:605: Kriyacitte ca karaṇe, kiriyaṃ kammani kriyā;
anya-e0809n4:606: Sunisāyaṃ tu kaññāya, jāyāya ca vadhū matā.
anya-e0809n4:609: Suttaṃ pāvacane riṭṭhe siddhe (ṭī.), tante taṃ supite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:611: Rājaliṅgo’sabhaṅgesu, rukkhe ca kakudokakudho (ṭī. sī.) pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:614: Vohāre jetu micchāyaṃ, kīḷādo cāpi devanaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:615: Bhariyāyaṃ tu kedāre, sarīre khetta mīritaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:618: Sūlaṃ tu nitthiyaṃ heti, bhede saṃku rujāsu ca.
anya-e0809n4:621: Rathādyaṅge tu ca yugo, kappamhi yugale yugaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:623: Itthipupphe ca reṇumhi, rajo pakatije guṇe;
anya-e0809n4:627: Paṇḍake joti nakkhatta, raṃsīsva’ggimhi joti so.
anya-e0809n4:629: Kaṇḍo nitthī sare daṇḍe, vagge cāvasare pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:630: Uddhaṃbāhudvayamāne bāhudvayummāne (sī. ka.), sūrattepi ca porisaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:636: Padhāne tu ca sānumhi, visāṇe siṅga muccate.
anya-e0809n4:639: Heme pañcasuvaṇṇe ca, nikkho nitthī pasādhane.
anya-e0809n4:641: Tithibhede ca sākhādi, phaḷumhi pabba muccate;
anya-e0809n4:654: Sassate ca dhuvo tīsu, dhuvaṃ takke ca nicchite.
anya-e0809n4:656: Hare sivo, sivaṃ bhadda, mokkhesu, jambuke sivā;
anya-e0809n4:657: Senāyaṃ sattiyañceva, thūlatte ca balaṃ bhave.
anya-e0809n4:660: Devabhede vasu pume, paṇḍakaṃ ratane dhane.
anya-e0809n4:662: Nibbānaṃ atthagamane, apavagge siyā tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:666: Sukkaṃ tu sambhave, sukko, dhavale, kusale tisu.
anya-e0809n4:668: Dāyo dāne vibhattabba, dhane ca pitunaṃ vane dhane (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n4:671: Paribhāsana makkose, niyame bhāsane tha ca,
anya-e0809n4:680: Pupphe phale ca pasavo, uppāde gabbhamocane;
anya-e0809n4:690: Majjhimo dehamajjhasmiṃ, majjhabhave ca so tisu.
anya-e0809n4:693: Sobhā sampattīsu sirī, lakkhītthī devatāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:695: Kumāro yuvarāje ca, khande vutto susumhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:698: Paṇo vetana mūlesu, vohāre ca dhane mato;
anya-e0809n4:701: Asubhe ca subhe kamme, bhāgyaṃ vuttaṃ dvaye pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:707: Cāge sabhāve nimmāne, saggo jjhāye divepyatha;
anya-e0809n4:708: Rohito lohite maccha, bhede ceva migantare.
anya-e0809n4:714: Dabbaṃ bhabbe guṇādhāre, vitte ca budha dārusu.
anya-e0809n4:716: Mānaṃ pamāṇe patthādo, māno vutto vidhāya ca;
anya-e0809n4:717: Atho parissame vutto, vāyāmo vīriyepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:720: Chidde tu chiddavante ca, susiraṃ tūriyantare.
anya-e0809n4:723: Atho gārava bhītīsu, saṃvege sambhamo mato.
anya-e0809n4:728: Māse jeṭṭho, tivuddhā’ti, ppasatthesu ca tīsu so;
anya-e0809n4:729: Dhamme ca maṅgale seyyo, so pasatthatare tisu.
anya-e0809n4:731: Ādiccādimhi gahaṇe, nibandhe ca ghare gaho;
anya-e0809n4:735: Bimbaṃ tu paṭibimbe ca, maṇḍale bimbikāphale.
anya-e0809n4:740: Samā vasse, samo kheda, santīsu, so nibhe tisu;
anya-e0809n4:744: Rattaṃ tu soṇite, tambā, nuratta, rañjite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:746: Tace kāye ca tanvitthī, tīsva’ppe viraḷe kise;
anya-e0809n4:747: Utubhede tu sisiro, hime so sītale tisu.
anya-e0809n4:749: Sakkharā guḷabhede ca, kathalepi ca dissati;
anya-e0809n4:750: Anuggahe tu saṅkhepe, gahaṇe saṅgaho mato.
anya-e0809n4:752: Dakkhe ca tikhiṇe byatte, rogamutte paṭuttisu;
anya-e0809n4:753: Rājā tu khattiye vutto, naranāthe pabhumhi ca.
anya-e0809n4:755: Khalañca dhaññakaraṇe, kakke nīce khalo bhave;
anya-e0809n4:759: Bhayaṅkare tu kaṭhine, kurūro tīsu niddaye.
anya-e0809n4:764: Adharo tīsvadho hīne, pume dantacchade pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:765: Sussusā sotu micchāya, sā pāricariyāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:767: Hattho pāṇimhi ratane, gaṇe soṇḍāya bhantare;
anya-e0809n4:768: Āvāṭe udapāne ca, kūpo kumbhe ca dissati.
anya-e0809n4:771: Vajjabhede ca vita taṃ, taṃ vitthāre tiliṅgikaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:773: Sāro bale thiraṃse ca, uttame so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:776: Mandire rogabhede ca, khayo apacayamhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:777: Vāḷo tu sāpade sappe, kurūre so tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n4:779: Sālo sajjaddume rukkhe, sālāgehe ca dissati;
anya-e0809n4:780: Sote tu savanaṃ vuttaṃ, yajane sutiyampi ca.
anya-e0809n4:782: Tīsu pato pareto ca, mate ca petayonije;
anya-e0809n4:783: Khyāte tu haṭṭhe viññāte, patītaṃ vāccaliṅgikaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:785: Adhippāye ca ādhāre, āsayo kathito tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:786: Pattaṃ pakkhe dale, patto, bhājane so gate tisu.
anya-e0809n4:788: Kusale sukataṃ, suṭṭhu, kate ca sukato tisu;
anya-e0809n4:792: Assādane tu rasanaṃ, jivhāyañca dhanimhi ca.
anya-e0809n4:794: Paṇīto tīsu madhure, uttame vihite pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:797: Pāpasmiṃ gagane dukkhe, byasane cā’gha muccate;
anya-e0809n4:798: Samūhe paṭalaṃ netta, roge vuttaṃ chadimhi ca.
anya-e0809n4:801: Sattannaṃ pūraṇe seṭṭhe, tisante sattamo tisu.
anya-e0809n4:803: Ojā tu yāpanāyañca, ojo ditti balesu ca;
anya-e0809n4:804: Atho nisāmanaṃ vuttaṃ, dassane savanepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:806: Gabbho kucchiṭṭhasatte ca, kucchi ovarakesu ca;
anya-e0809n4:812: Asumhi āyumhi (ṭī.), 407-gāthā passitabbā ca bale pāṇo, satte hadayagā’nile;
anya-e0809n4:819: Saraṇaṃ tu vadhe gehe, rakkhitasmiñca rakkhaṇe.
anya-e0809n4:821: Thiyaṃ kantā piye, kanto, manuññe, so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:822: Gavakkhe tu samūhe ca, jālaṃ macchādibandhane.
anya-e0809n4:825: Sasaddhe tīsu nivāpe, saddhaṃ, saddhā ca paccaye.
anya-e0809n4:827: Bījaṃ hetumhi aṭṭhismiṃ, aṅgajāte ca dissati;
anya-e0809n4:832: Āgamane tu dīghādi, nikāyesu ca āgamo.
anya-e0809n4:834: Santāno devarukkhe ca, vutto santatiyaṃ pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:838: Chāyā tu ātapābhāve, paṭibimbe pabhāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:840: Gimhe ghammo nidāgho ca, uṇhe sedajale pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:843: Aṅgā dese bahumha’ṅgaṃ, aṅgo dese vapumha’ṅga (ṭī.) tathā’vayavahetusu;
anya-e0809n4:847: Supinaṃ supine sutta, viññāṇe ta manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:855: Vutto visārado tīsu, suppagabbhe ca paṇḍite;
anya-e0809n4:858: Drave vaṇṇe rasabhede, kasāyo surabhimhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:865: Kavace vāravāṇe ca, nimmokepi ca kañcuko.
anya-e0809n4:867: Lohabhede mataṃ tambaṃ, tambo ratte tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:870: Bodhane ca padāne ca, viññeyyaṃ paṭipādanaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:873: Satthaṃ āyudha ganthesu, lohe, sattho ca sañcaye;
anya-e0809n4:877: Atha kambu mato saṅkhe, suvaṇṇe valayepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:880: Dupphasse tikhiṇe tīsu, gadrabhe kakace kharo.
anya-e0809n4:892: Paṭibhānaṃ tu paññāyaṃ, upaṭṭhita girāya ca.
anya-e0809n4:895: Udare tu tathā pācā, nalasmiṃ gahaṇī’tthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:897: Piyo bhattari, jāyāyaṃ, piyā, iṭṭhe piyo tisu;
anya-e0809n4:898: Yamarāje tu yugaḷe, saṃyame ca yamo bhave.
anya-e0809n4:900: Muddikassa ca pupphassa, rase khudde madhū’ritaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:901: Ulloce tu ca vitthāre, vitānaṃ punnapuṃsake.
anya-e0809n4:903: Apavagge ca salile, sudhāyaṃ amataṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n4:904: Mohe tu timire saṅkhyā, guṇe tama manitthiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:906: Khare cā’kāriye tīsu, rasamhi purise kaṭu;
anya-e0809n4:907: Paṇḍake sukate, puññaṃ, manuññe pavane tisu.
anya-e0809n4:909: Rukkho dumamhi, pharusā, siniddhesu ca so tisu;
anya-e0809n4:910: Uppattiyaṃ tu hetumhi, saṅge sukke ca sambhavo.
anya-e0809n4:912: Nimittaṃ kāraṇe vuttaṃ, aṅgajāte ca lañchane;
anya-e0809n4:915: Vede ca mantane manto, mantā paññāya muccate;
anya-e0809n4:918: Aruṇo raṃsibhede cā, byattarāge ca lohite;
anya-e0809n4:922: Ākāro kāraṇe vutto, saṇṭhāne iṅgitepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:924: Sudditthi tanaye khattā, uggo, tibbamhi so tisu;
anya-e0809n4:927: Kallaṃ pabhāte, niroga, sajjadakkhesu yuttadakkhesu (ka.) tīsu taṃ;
anya-e0809n4:930: Kapoto pakkhibhede ca, diṭṭho pārāvate tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:933: Tīsu khare ca kaṭhine, kakkaso sāhasappiye sāhasappiye=sāhasa+appiye (ṭī.);
anya-e0809n4:934: Akāriye tu guyhaṅge, cīre kopīna muccate.
anya-e0809n4:940: Athuppāde siyā dhūma, ketu vessānarepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:945: Apavagge vināse ca, nirodho rodhane pyatha;
anya-e0809n4:946: Bhaye paṭibhayaṃ vuttaṃ, tiliṅgaṃ taṃ bhayaṃkare.
anya-e0809n4:952: Upajāpe mato bhedo, visese ca vidāraṇe.
anya-e0809n4:958: Guṇukkaṃse ca vibhave, sampatti ceva sampadā.
anya-e0809n4:960: Bhūkhantīsu khamā, yogye, hite sakke yutte (ṭī.) 1001-gāthā passitabbākhamo tisu;
anya-e0809n4:961: Addho bhāge pathe kāle, ekaṃse’ddho’byayaṃ bhave;
anya-e0809n4:964: Usabho’sadha go usabho usabhe (ṭī.) seṭṭhe, sū’sabhaṃ vīsayaṭṭhiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:965: Setusmiṃ tanti pantīsu, nāriyaṃ pāḷi kathyate.
anya-e0809n4:967: Kaṭo jaye’tthinimitte, kilañje so kate tisu;
anya-e0809n4:970: Vitakke mathite takko, tathā sūciphale mato;
anya-e0809n4:974: Baddhanissita setesu, tīsu taṃ mihite sitaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:976: Thiyaṃ pajāpati dāre, brahme māre sure pume;
anya-e0809n4:977: Vāsudeve’ntake kaṇho, so pāpe asite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:980: Sakko inde janapade, sākiye, so khame tisu.
anya-e0809n4:982: Vajjane parihāro ca, sakkāre ceva rakkhaṇe;
anya-e0809n4:983: Sotāpannādike agge, ariyo tīsu, dvije pume.
anya-e0809n4:985: Susuko susumāre ca, bālake ca ulūpini;
anya-e0809n4:988: Asano piyake kaṇḍe, bhakkhaṇe khipane’ sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:989: Yuge’dhikāre vikāre (ṭī.) vīriye, padhāne cā’ntike dhuro.
anya-e0809n4:991: Kāḷe ca bhakkhite tīsu, lavitte asito pume;
anya-e0809n4:994: Ummāre esikatthambhe, indakhīlo mato tha ca;
anya-e0809n4:997: Dhaññaṃ sālyādike vuttaṃ, dhañño puññavati ttisu;
anya-e0809n4:998: Pāṇi hatthe ca satte bhū, saṇhakaraṇiyaṃ mato.
anya-e0809n4:1000: Tīsu pītaṃ halidyābhe, haṭṭhe ca pāyite siyā;
anya-e0809n4:1003: Lohitādimhi lobhe ca, rāgo ca rañjane mato;
anya-e0809n4:1004: Padaro phalake bhaṅge, pavuddha dariyaṃ pica.
anya-e0809n4:1010: Kāro’ gabhede sakkāre, kārā tu bandhanālaye.
anya-e0809n4:1013: Pāpane ca padātismiṃ, gamane patti nāriyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:1015: Chiddaṃ randhañca vivaraṃ, susire dūsanepi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1016: Muttā tu muttike, muttaṃ, passāve, muccite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:1018: Nisedhe vāraṇaṃ, hatthi, liṅga hatthīsu vāraṇo;
anya-e0809n4:1019: Dānaṃ cāge made suddhe, khaṇḍane lavane khaye.
anya-e0809n4:1024: Haritasmiñca paṇṇe ca, palāso kiṃ sukaddume;
anya-e0809n4:1027: Pakkaṃ phalamhi, taṃ nāsu, mmukhe nāsamukhe (ka.) pariṇate tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1028: Piṇḍo ājīvane dehe, piṇḍane goḷake mato.
anya-e0809n4:1030: Vaṭṭo paribbaye kammā, dike, so vaṭṭule tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1033: Nāriyaṃ bhīru kathitā, bhīruke so tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:1036: Vāmaṃ sabyamhi, taṃ cāru, viparītesu tīsva’tha;
anya-e0809n4:1037: Saṅkhyābhede sarabye ca, cihaṇe lakkha muccate.
anya-e0809n4:1050: Sambhave cā’suci pume, amejjhe tīsu dissati.
anya-e0809n4:1052: Accho ikke pume vutto, pasannamhi tiliṅgiko;
anya-e0809n4:1053: Baḷise selabhede ca, vaṅko, so kuṭile tisu.
anya-e0809n4:1057: Sabbasmiṃ sakalo tīsu, addhamhi purise siyā.
anya-e0809n4:1062: Rudhire lohitaṃ vuttaṃ, rattamhi lohito tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1063: Uttamaṅge pume muddhā, muddho mūḷhe tiliṅgiko.
anya-e0809n4:1065: Raṭṭhamhi vijitaṃ vuttaṃ, jite ca vijito tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1066: Parittaṃ tu parittāṇe, paritto tīsu appake.
anya-e0809n4:1071: Vaṅgo lohantare vaṅgā, dese pume bahumhi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1072: Kammārabhaṇḍabhede ca, khaṭake muṭṭhi ca dvisu.
anya-e0809n4:1077: Pume mahesī sugate, deviyaṃ nāriyaṃ matā;
anya-e0809n4:1081: Vijjā vede ca sippe ca, tivijjādo ca buddhiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:1084: Pajjaṃ siloke, pajjo’ddhe, pajjo pādahite tisu.
anya-e0809n4:1087: Vidheyye assavo tīsu, pubbamhī purise siyā.
anya-e0809n4:1092: Assattho tīsu assāsa, ppatte, bodhiddume pume;
anya-e0809n4:1093: Tīsu luddo kurūre ca, nesādamhi pume siyā.
anya-e0809n4:1095: Vilaggo tīsu laggasmiṃ, pume majjhamhi dissati;
anya-e0809n4:1098: Kaṭṭhaṃ dārumhi, taṃ kicche, gahane kasite tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1099: Sasantāne ca visaye, gocare’ jjhatta muccateti.
anya-e0809n4:1102: Bhuvane ca jane loko, moretvaggimhi so sikhī;
anya-e0809n4:1106: Vaṭabyāmesu nigrodho, dhaṅko tu vāyase bake;
anya-e0809n4:1109: Ucchaṅge lakkhaṇe cā’ṅko, rasmi’tthī juti rajjusu;
anya-e0809n4:1113: Sūraṃ’sūsu pume bhānū, daṇḍo tu muggare dame;
anya-e0809n4:1121: Dāyādo bandhave putte, sire sīsaṃ tipumhi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1126: Thambho thūṇa jaḷattesu, sūpo kummāsa byañjane;
anya-e0809n4:1127: Gaṇḍo phoṭe kapolamhi, aggho mūlye ca pūjane.
anya-e0809n4:1130: Bhāgye vidhi vidhāne ca, sare khagge ca sāyako.
anya-e0809n4:1132: Sāraṅgo cātake eṇe, pattī tu sarapakkhisu;
anya-e0809n4:1140: Amate tu sudhā lepe, abhikhyā nāma raṃsisu;
anya-e0809n4:1141: Satti sāmatthiye satthe, mahī najjantare bhuvi;
anya-e0809n4:1146: Pavatti vutti vattāsu, vetane bharaṇe bhati.
anya-e0809n4:1149: Soppe pamāde tandī ca, yātrā gamana vuttisu.
anya-e0809n4:1154: Icchāyaṃ jutiyaṃ kanti, rañjane sūrate rati;
anya-e0809n4:1155: Gehe vasati vāse tha, nadī senāsu vāhinī.
anya-e0809n4:1157: Patthe nāḷe ca nāḷi’tthī, gaṇe samiti saṅgame;
anya-e0809n4:1158: Taṇhā lobhe pipāsāyaṃ, magga vuttīsu vattanī.
anya-e0809n4:1160: Pāṇyaṅge nābhi cakkante, yāce viññatti ñāpane;
anya-e0809n4:1161: Vitti tose vedanāyaṃ, ṭhāne tu jīvite ṭhiti.
anya-e0809n4:1163: Taraṅge cā’ntare vīci, dhīratte dhāraṇe dhiti;
anya-e0809n4:1164: Bhū bhūmiyañca bhamuke, sadde vede save suti.
anya-e0809n4:1166: Gottaṃ nāme ca vaṃse tha, nagare ca ghare puraṃ;
anya-e0809n4:1167: Okaṃ tu nissaye gehe, kulaṃ tu gottarāsisu.
anya-e0809n4:1169: Heme vitte hiraññañca, paññāṇaṃ tva’ṅka vuddhisu;
anya-e0809n4:1170: Athā’mbarañca khe vatthe, guyhaṃ liṅge rahasya’pi.
anya-e0809n4:1172: Tapo dhamme vate ceva, pāpe tvā’gumhi kibbisaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:1173: Ratanaṃ maṇi seṭṭhesu, vassaṃ hāyana vuṭṭhisu.
anya-e0809n4:1175: Vanaṃ arañña vārīsu, khīramhi tu jale payo;
anya-e0809n4:1176: Akkharaṃ lipi mokkhesu, methūnaṃ saṅgame rate.
anya-e0809n4:1178: Sotaṃ kaṇṇe payovege, riṭṭhaṃ pāpā’subhesu ca;
anya-e0809n4:1182: Vāccaliṅgā paramito, byatto tu paṇḍite phuṭe.
anya-e0809n4:1188: Bībhaccho vikate bhīme, komale tikhiṇe mudu;
anya-e0809n4:1189: Iṭṭhe ca madhure sādu, sādumhi madhuro piye.
anya-e0809n4:1191: Site tu suddhe odāto, dvijivho sūcakā’hisu;
anya-e0809n4:1197: Suci suddhe site pūte, pesalo dakkhacārusu;
anya-e0809n4:1198: Adhamo kucchite ūne, appiye pya’liko bhave.
anya-e0809n4:1200: Byāpe asuddhe saṃkiṇṇo, bhabbaṃ yogye ca bhāvini;
anya-e0809n4:1201: Sukhumo appakā’ṇūsu, vuddho there ca paṇḍite.
anya-e0809n4:1203: Subhe sādhumhi bhaddo tha, tyā’do ca vipule bahu;
anya-e0809n4:1204: Dhīro budhe dhitimante, vellitaṃ kuṭile dhute.
anya-e0809n4:1206: Visado byatta setesu, taruṇo tu yuve nave;
anya-e0809n4:1211: Kalyāṇaṃ sundare cāpi, himo tu sītalepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1213: Lole tu sīghe capalo, vutte udita muggate;
anya-e0809n4:1214: Āditte gabbite ditto, piṭṭhaṃ tu cuṇṇitepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1216: Vigate vāyite vāyane (ka.)vītaṃ, bhāvitaṃ vaḍḍhitepi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1217: Bhajjite patite bhaṭṭho, puṭṭho pucchita posite.
anya-e0809n4:1221: Sūro vīre ravisūre, duṭṭho kuddhe ca dūsite.
anya-e0809n4:1225: Nindāyaṃ khepane khepo, niyamo nicchaye vate.
anya-e0809n4:1236: Mālyaṃ tu pupphe taddāme, vāho tu sakaṭe haye.
anya-e0809n4:1239: Bhe tārakā nettamajjhe, sīmā’ vadhi, ṭṭhitīsu ca.
anya-e0809n4:1243: Satte thūle tīsu daḷho, latā sākhāya valliyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:1247: Nīce puthujjano mūḷhe, bhattā sāmini dhārake.
anya-e0809n4:1249: Sikhā, piñchesu sikhaṇḍo, satte tva’ttani puggalo;
anya-e0809n4:1253: Vacco rūpe karīse tha, juti’tthī kantiraṃsisu;
anya-e0809n4:1255: Labbhaṃ yutte ca laddhabbe, khaṇḍe paṇṇe dalaṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0809n4:1256: Sallaṃ kaṇḍe salākāyaṃ, sucitte dhāvanaṃ gate;
anya-e0809n4:1261: Mitte sahāye ca sakhā, vibhū niccappabhūsu so.
anya-e0809n4:1263: Khagge kurūre nettiṃso, parasmiṃ atra tīsva’mu;
anya-e0809n4:1268: Yānaṃ rathādo gamane, sarūpasmiṃ adho talaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:1270: Majjho vilagge vemajjhe, pupphaṃ tu kusumo’tusu;
anya-e0809n4:1271: Sīlaṃ sabhāve subbate, puṅgavo usabhe vare.
anya-e0809n4:1274: Nettiṃse gaṇḍake khaggo, kadambo tu dume caye.
anya-e0809n4:1277: Akkose sapathe sāpo, paṅkaṃ pāpe ca kaddame.
anya-e0809n4:1280: Bale pabhāve vīriyaṃ, tejo tesu ca dittiyaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:1282: Dhārā santati khaggaṅge, vānaṃ taṇhāya sibbane;
anya-e0809n4:1283: Khattā sūte paṭihāre, vitti pīḷāsu vedanā.
anya-e0809n4:1285: Thiyaṃ mati’cchāpaññāsu, pāpe yuddhe rave raṇo;
anya-e0809n4:1286: Lavotu bindu’cchedesu, palāle’ palāse (ṭī.), palāpe-ṭī (453-1124) gāthā passitabbā tisaye bhusaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:1288: Bādhā dukkhe nisedhe ca, mūlapadepi mātikā;
anya-e0809n4:1292: Ketusmiṃ ketanaṃ gehe, ṭhāne bhūmi’tthiyaṃ bhuvi;
anya-e0809n4:1293: Lekhye lekho rāji lekhā, pūjite bhagavā jine.
anya-e0809n4:1295: Gadā satthe gado roge, nisajjā pīṭhesvā’sanaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:1299: Bilaṃ koṭṭhāsa chiddesu, vajjaṃ dose ca bheriyaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:1304: Yūpo thambhe ca pāsāde, ayanaṃ gamane pathe.
anya-e0809n4:1317: Annādo āmisaṃ maṃse; Dikkhā tu yajane’ccane.
anya-e0809n4:1321: Kusumaṃ thīraje pupphe, vānare tu budhe kavi.
anya-e0809n4:1323: Adhare kharabhe oṭṭho, luddo tu luddakepi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1324: Kalusaṃ tvā’vile pāpe, pāpe kali parājaye.
anya-e0809n4:1326: Kantāro vana, duggesu, caro cāramhi cañcale;
anya-e0809n4:1327: Janāvāse gaṇe gāmo, cammaṃ tu phalake tace.
anya-e0809n4:1331: Sattāyaṃ bhavanaṃ gehe, lese tu khalite chalaṃ.
anya-e0809n4:1333: Veraṃ pāpe ca paṭighe, taco cammani vakkale;
anya-e0809n4:1336: Paṭihāre mukhe dvāraṃ, pete ñāte mato tisu;
anya-e0809n4:1337: Māso paraṇṇa kālesu, naggo tva’celakepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1339: Dose ghāte ca paṭigho, migādo chagale pasu;
anya-e0809n4:1340: Arūpe cā’vhaye nāmaṃ, daro daratha bhītisu.
anya-e0809n4:1350: Havi sappimhi hotabbe, siro seṭṭhe ca muddhani;
anya-e0809n4:1351: Vicārepi viveko tha, sikharī pabbate dume.
anya-e0809n4:1353: Vego jave pavāhe ca, saṅku tu khilahetisu;
anya-e0809n4:1354: Niggahīte kaṇe bindu, varāho sūkare gaje.
anya-e0809n4:1371: Vatthe gandhe ghare vāso, cullo khudde ca uddhane.
anya-e0809n4:1381: Sākhāyaṃ viṭapo thambhe, sattu khajjantare dise;
anya-e0809n4:1384: Rāge raṅgo naccaṭṭhāne, pānaṃ peyye ca pītiyaṃ;
anya-e0809n4:1392: Matā’vāṭe caye kāsu, panisā kāraṇe raho;
anya-e0809n4:1400: Dasā’ vatthā paṭantesu, kāraṇaṃ ghāta, hetusu.
anya-e0809n4:1402: Hatthidāne mado gabbe, ghaṭā ghaṭana rāsisu;
anya-e0809n4:1407: Pāne pamode pīti’tthī, iṇe givā galepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1410: Bhaṅgo bhede paṭe bhaṅgaṃ, chattaṃ tu chavakepi ca.
anya-e0809n4:1412: Ñāṇe bhuvi ca bhūri’ttī, anaṅge madano dume;
anya-e0809n4:1420: Khette vappe (pākāramūle nettajale usume ca vappo-ṭī) vappo taṭepi ca;
anya-e0809n4:1425: Saṅghāto yugagehaṅge, khāro ūse ca bhasmani.
